name: Spirit of Speed 1937 [SDC]
description:
Spirit of Speed 1937 is a simulation, sports and racing game developed by MicroProse Software and Broadsword Interactive. It came out on 01-12-1999. Acclaim Entertainment published the game. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
You can play Spirit of Speed 1937 on Dreamcast and PC.
